705587f-a.title: Brooklyn: Marine Park - foot of Gerritsen Avenue.
705587f-a.text:
Marine ark, as seen from foot of Gerritsen Ave. A panoramic set of
two views.
June 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
705587f-a.folder: Marine Park & foot of Gerritsen Avenue., Brooklyn, NY

705589f-a.title: Brooklyn: Marine Park - Gerritsen Creek - West Bank.
705589f-a.text:
Marine Park: Gerritsen Creek, west bank, in Marine Park, viewed
southeastward, towards Floyd Bennett Field.
June 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
705589f-a.folder: Marine Park & Gerritsen Creek & West Bank., Brooklyn, NY

705582f-a.title: Brooklyn: Marine Park - Marine Park Beach.
705582f-a.text:
Marine Park: A view of Marine Park Beach near the Canal.
June 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
705582f-a.folder: Marine Park & Marine Park Beach., Brooklyn, NY

705583f-a.title: Brooklyn: Marine Park - Marine Park Beach.
705583f-a.text:
Marine Park, showing boats at anchorage at Marine Park Beach. In the
left background is the Admtnistrative buildings of Floyd Bennett Field.
The writer believes this view is south east and that the boats are
anchored in Mill Creek.
June 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
705583f-a.folder: Marine Park & Marine Park Beach., Brooklyn, NY

705584f-a.title: Brooklyn: Marine Park - Marine Park Canal.
705584f-a.text:
Marine Park: A view of Marine Park Canal.
June 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
705584f-a.folder: Marine Park & Marine Park Canal., Brooklyn, NY

705585f-a.title: Brooklyn: Marine Park - Marine Park Canal.
705585f-a.text:
Marine ~ark: At Marine Vark Canal, showing a refreshment truck catering
to the wants of the bathers. This view is east.
June 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
705585f-a.folder: Marine Park & Marine Park Canal., Brooklyn, NY

705591f-a.title: Brooklyn: Marine Park - west - Gerritsen Creek - south - Gerritsen Inlet Mill Creek.
705591f-a.text:
Marine Park, west bank of Gerritsen Creek (Marine Park Canal), south
towards Gerritsen Inlet and Mill Creek, showing a set of 3 views, of the
beach. In No. 3 the Administrative buildings of Floyd Bennett Field may
be seen at the left background.
June 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
705591f-a.folder: Marine Park & west & Gerritsen Creek & south & Gerritsen Inlet Mill Creek., Brooklyn, NY

705588f-b.title: Brooklyn: Marine Park - west side - Gerritsen Creek, east.
705588f-b.text:
Marine Park, west side of Gerritsen Creek, viewed eastward, showing
Flatbush Ave. in the background. This is a set of 3 views taken from
different angles.
June 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
705588f-b.folder: Marine Park & west side & Gerritsen Creek, east., Brooklyn, NY

705580f-b.title: Brooklyn: Marine Park.
705580f-b.text:
Marine Park: Marine Park Canal in Marine Park showing a set of
two views at different angles. Note the pretzel vendor in view No. 2.
June 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

705580f-a.title: Brooklyn: Marine Park.
705580f-a.text:
Marine Park: Marine Park Canal in Marine Park showing a set of
two views at different angles. Note the pretzel vendor in view No. 2.
June 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

705581f-b.title: Brooklyn: Marine Park.
705581f-b.text:
Marine Park: A set of three views looking southeastward from Marine
Park Beach at Gerritsen Creek and Plumb Beach Channel, towards Flatbush
Ave. (seen in the background with cars thereon). This area will be filled
leaving onky a canal, the rest of it is to be used for recreational
purposes.
June 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
